title: Send a Contract for a Group Block
description: A client has verbally agreed to a group block proposal, and the sales manager needs to send a formal contract.

tasks.description: Generate the legal contract based on the agreed-upon proposal, including rates, dates, and cancellation terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal contract is generated from a template.

tasks.description: Send the contract to the client for electronic signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: The contract is sent via an e-signature platform.

tasks.description: Once signed, the system automatically updates the group block status from 'Tentative' to 'Definite'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The block status is updated, confirming the sale.
